title: Hi. I wanted to ask if my situation is covered for compensation due to pixel mic problems
content:
Hi
I wanted to ask if my situation is covered for compensation due to my pixel problems.
I have bought my phone before Jan 2017 and changed my phone because of microphone problems and got a new one but after a year same problems happened to the new one again and now again a fixed device has been sent to me after a lot of time wasted...
Before my purchase I contacted Google and askes if there is any potential problem in the phone and I was assured that there is no problem.
I've read the following news:
https://www.androidauthority.com/google-pixel-xl-lawsuit-settlement-986149/
